title: IAutoBalloonOptions.ReverseDirection
description: Gets and sets whether to reverse the item ordering of the balloons.
returns: True to reverse the item ordering, false to not; only valid when IAutoBalloonOptions::ItemOrder is set to swBalloonItemNumbersOrder_e .swBalloonItemNumbers_OrderSequentially
remarks:
See the SOLIDWORKS Help for additional details about
autoballoons
.
